scripts.network:mobile: pnpm happ:build-debug && concurrently -k "pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm tauri ios dev" "pnpm tauri dev"
scripts.network:android: pnpm happ:build-debug && concurrently -k "pnpm -F ui start" "pnpm tauri dev" "pnpm tauri android dev"
scripts.network: pnpm happ:build-debug && UI_PORT=1420 mprocs "pnpm -F lobby start" "pnpm tauri dev" "pnpm tauri dev"
scripts.test: pnpm run happ:build-debug && pnpm -F tests test
scripts.happ:build: nix build --no-update-lock-file --accept-flake-config -L .#plenty_happ.meta.release -o workdir/plenty.happ && pnpm -F ui package && hc web-app pack workdir
